May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Is "straightforward Running Shot + Pen/Psy + ESD for 50 points" becoming a more common Common trope, lately, or have I not been paying attention? This one flies, and your opponent can't mitigate his ESD with Perplex (due to Guardians TA), so they'd have to use Outwit for that. Running Shot him into Hindering so that if he gets tapped he's got the Stealth protection. In Sealed, his Leadership gives some extra appeal to the many 45-point pieces in this set--Leadership based on sharing his keywords isn't as likely to come up (though having tokens removed could make his 100-point Uncommon counterpart a slightly bigger threat).
May 2, 2022
Goop
No special powers but he's very solid for his cost.
